title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.1 - Declaratory rulings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.1 - Declaratory rulings

State Regulations

Any person may, in writing submitted in duplicate, request
of the Superintendent of Banks a declaratory ruling with respect to: (a) the application of any regulation or
statute enforceable by the superintendent to any person, property or statement
of facts; or
(b) whether any action
by the superintendent should be taken pursuant to a regulation or
rule. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
110.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
